title: Intro Animation Plays on First Load
description: Verify that the Stranger Things-inspired intro animation plays correctly when the homepage is loaded for the first time.

steps.description: Clear browser cache or use incognito mode.
Navigate to the homepage URL.
Confirm the intro animation starts playing automatically.
Verify the animation completes without visual glitches or freezes.

title: Intro Animation Skip Functionality
description: Confirm that users can skip the intro animation and proceed directly to main homepage content.

steps.description: Load the homepage.
Click the 'Skip' button on the intro animation screen.
Verify that the intro animation stops promptly and main homepage content loads.

title: Event Exploration Modal Opens and Displays Details
description: Test that clicking on an event in the events listing opens a modal displaying detailed event information.

steps.description: Navigate to the events exploration page or section.
Click on an event item.
Verify that an event details modal opens.
Check that all event attributes (name, description, rules, date/time, venue) are displayed correctly.

title: Multi-step Registration Form Success Flow
description: Validate that a user can successfully complete the multi-step registration form with valid inputs and payment upload.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid personal information and proceed to next step.
Enter valid academic information and proceed.
Upload a valid payment receipt image (accepted format and size).
Submit the registration.
Verify form validates all inputs without errors.
Confirm successful submission with confirmation message and backend record creation.

title: Multi-step Registration Form Validation Errors
description: Verify real-time validation messages appear appropriately for invalid inputs at each step of the registration form.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page.
Enter invalid data (empty required fields, invalid email format, incorrect file format or size for payment upload).
Check that real-time validation errors appear for each invalid input.
Attempt to proceed to next step or submit and verify submission is blocked.

title: Schedule Viewing Timeline Display
description: Ensure the public schedule page displays events grouped correctly by festival days in a timeline format.

steps.description: Navigate to the schedule viewing page.
Verify that festival days are displayed as distinct sections.
Check that events are grouped under their correct respective days in chronological order.
Validate timeline interface elements and navigation between days.

title: Admin Login Authentication Success
description: Test that admins with valid credentials can log in successfully and access the protected dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin login page.
Enter valid username and password.
Click the login button.
Verify successful login and redirection to admin dashboard.

title: Admin Login Authentication Failure
description: Verify that invalid admin login attempts are rejected with appropriate error messages and access is denied.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page.
Enter incorrect username and/or password.
Click login button.
Verify that login is rejected and error message is displayed.
Attempt to manually access an admin protected route.
Confirm user is redirected back to the login page and no protected data is visible.

title: Admin Dashboard Metrics Display Accuracy
description: Confirm the admin dashboard displays accurate registration counts, revenue totals, and event metrics reflecting the current system data.

steps.description: Login as admin and open the dashboard.
Verify registration counts match the backend records.
Check revenue numbers are calculated and displayed correctly.
Ensure event count metrics reflect actual events in the system.

title: Event Management CRUD Operations
description: Test create, edit, and delete operations for events in the admin panel, ensuring data consistency and UI updates.

steps.description: Login to admin panel and navigate to event management interface.
Create a new event with all mandatory fields completed.
Verify the new event appears in the event list with correct data.
Edit an existing event's details and save changes.
Confirm the updated event details are correctly reflected in the list.
Delete an event.
Verify the event is removed from the event list and no errors occur.

title: Registration Management Approve and Reject Payments
description: Validate admin actions to approve or reject user payment screenshots correctly update registration statuses and reports.

steps.description: Login to admin and navigate to registration management.
Select a pending registration with uploaded payment.
Approve the payment.
Check registration status updates to 'approved' and reports reflect the transaction.
Repeat the process and reject a payment.
Verify registration status updates to 'rejected' and relevant notifications are generated.

title: Schedule Builder Drag-and-Drop Functionality
description: Ensure that admin users can drag and drop event items to create or modify the festival schedule timeline and changes persist.

steps.description: Login as admin and access the schedule builder interface.
Drag an event item to a different position or day in the timeline.
Save the schedule changes.
Verify that the schedule updates visually and data persists after reload.

title: Contact Form Validation and Submission
description: Validate that the contact form enforces input validation and submits user inquiries to the admin backend for management.

steps.description: Navigate to the contact form page.
Enter valid contact information and message.
Confirm form accepts input without validation errors.
Submit the contact form.
Verify successful submission notification.
Login to admin and check that the query appears in the queries management list.

title: Contact Form Validation Errors
description: Test that invalid or incomplete inputs show proper validation error messages and block submission.

steps.description: Navigate to the contact page.
Attempt to submit form with empty required fields or invalid email format.
Validate that appropriate error messages are displayed and submission is prevented.

title: Legal Pages Display and Navigation
description: Check that terms of service, privacy policy, and refund policy pages load correctly and are accessible from the site footer links.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage.
Click links to Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and Refund Policy pages from footer.
Verify each legal page loads fully with correct content.
Ensure navigation flows back to homepage or prior pages as expected.

title: SEO Metadata Application Verification
description: Verify that every page applies correct SEO metadata and page titles for improved search engine presence.

steps.description: Visit various public-facing pages including homepage, event details, registration, and legal pages.
Check page source or use browser dev tools to verify SEO meta tags such as title, description, keywords are present and accurate.

title: Responsive Layout and Performance on Mobile Devices
description: Ensure the entire website, including animations, modals, forms, and admin panel, is fully responsive and performs smoothly on mobile devices.

steps.description: Access the site on multiple mobile devices or simulate via browser device emulation.
Verify layout adjustments for various screen sizes without content overlap or cutoff.
Confirm animations and UI components load and interact smoothly without crashes or slowdowns.
Navigate across all main workflows including event exploration, registration, schedule viewing, and admin management.
Check for broken navigation, black screens, or UI errors.

title: Data Export as CSV from Registration Management
description: Test exporting registration data to CSV files works correctly with accurate data and proper formatting.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to the registration management page.
Use the export functionality to download registration data as a CSV file.
Verify a CSV file is generated and downloaded.
Open the CSV and check that the data matches current registrations and is properly formatted.

title: Protected Routes Access Restriction
description: Confirm unauthorized users cannot access admin panel or other protected routes and are redirected to the login page.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard and other protected admin routes without logging in.
Verify redirection to admin login page.
Login as a non-admin or invalid user if applicable, and try accessing protected routes.
Ensure access is blocked.

title: Performance Optimizations Verification
description: Verify that performance features such as image loading optimizations, caching, and preload mechanisms reduce load times effectively.

steps.description: Navigate through the site and monitor network requests and load times using browser dev tools.
Check that images load progressively and use caching mechanisms.
Confirm that pages preload necessary assets to enhance user experience.

title: Error Handling and Display
description: Ensure the application gracefully handles and displays errors throughout, such as failed API calls, invalid routes, and backend failures.

steps.description: Simulate backend or network failures during registration submission, event loading, or admin data fetching.
Verify user-friendly error messages are displayed without crashing the app.
Navigate to a non-existent URL.
Confirm the custom 404 Not Found page is shown.
